channel.title: Fixeds on PurpleScreen
channel.description: Recent content in Fixeds on PurpleScreen

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! My name is Alexey Miasoedov. Currently I’m Senior Core System Administrator @Intermedia, based in St. Petersburg, Russia. This is a second revival of the the blog after being down for a year+. A lot of content was archived and new posts will mostly focus on open source. I hope you’ll find the content useful. Don’t shy to ping me in LinkedIn or email if you have any questions or have something to offer.
